title: AnandamAna
sahitya:
AnandamAna shuddAtmap-poruLai nAn enak-kalandu nalam peral yOgam


caraNam 1    pori pulan aDaippadu puri tava yOgam podu nalam purivaduvE karma yOgam
arivaduvAvaduvE jnAna yOgam anbEyAvaduvE bhakti yOgam
    caraNam 2    uDalinai urudi shei adu haTayOgam Om oli kETpaduvE japa yOgam
iDamaghal shaktiyai iruvarum vaLarttal illarattAr sheyum tAntira yOgam
    caraNam 3    dhyAnattilE Atma jnAnattai aDaindu deiva shakti balameid-iyalbAi
vAn kadir kATrena mazhai nadiyenavE vAzhvaduvE shuddha mAdhava yOgam
